main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted near Alexandria, Virginia on August 19, 1951, by Lt. Col. M.D. Willis and his wife.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a frosty silvery oval-shaped object approximately 50 feet long and 20 feet tall,It was observed traveling at high speed between altitudes of 2000 to 4000 feet,The object did not change shape or reflection as it moved through sunlight,There were no trails, smoke, or other signs of propulsion observed,The sighting was evaluated as possibly being a reflection from an aircraft at a higher altitude.
witness description: Lt. Col. M.D. Willis and his wife
